text: Comacchio by night The Idrovia Ferrarese (waterway of Ferrara) is a 70 km stretch of navigable water in the Italian Province of Ferrara, falling within the Po Delta Park. It links the river Po at Pontelagoscuro (frazione of Ferrara) to the Adriatic at Porto Garibaldi (frazione of Comacchio). The waterway, which is navigable by motor boats, is constituted by the Boicelli Canal from Pontelagoscuro to Ferrara (5.5 km), the Volano branch of the Po from Ferrara to Fiscaglia di Migliarino (34.5 km) and the Migliarino-Porto Garibaldi Canal from Migliarino to the sea (30 km). ==References== * ==External links== * PROVINCIA DI FERRARA - COS'È L'IDROVIA , from the official site of the Provincia di Ferrara. CIdrovia Ferrarese Category:Canals in Italy Category:Waterways of Italy Category:Landforms of Emilia-Romagna Category:Transport in Emilia-Romagna
title: Idrovia Ferrarese
